code: import React from'react';import{addPostActionCreator,updatePostTextActionCreator}from"../../../Redux/profileReducer";import MyPosts from"./MyPosts";import{connect}from"react-redux";var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{myPost:state.profilesPage.myPost,newPostText:state.profilesPage.newPostText};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{onAddPost:function onAddPost(){dispatch(addPostActionCreator());},updatePostText:function updatePostText(body){dispatch(updatePostTextActionCreator(body));}};};var PostContainer=connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(MyPosts);export default PostContainer;
